description: Use a timer not to measure time, but to introduce rhythm. The conceptual hums of "one two three, one two three", when transfigured into patterns of sounds or words or dances, gives rise to various forms of aesthetic experiences. If time is a river, then timers are the mills we build along its banks.

funcs.name: Timer
param: d duration of the timer in milliseconds

funcs.name: start
param: reset a boolean value to restart the timer from the beginning if set to true.

funcs.description: Check % of time that has elapsed currently.
